dct_description_sm: This line data layer represents routes for Colorado in 2004. The dataset was originally published by the Colorado Department of Transportation on April 3, 2004.[The route layer is CDOT's centerline representation of state highways. It is later combined with several 'On System' tables using dynamic segmentation]
